name: PEACEFUL CIRCLE MEN'S "PLEDGE 4 PEACE" TEE
description:
Peaceful Circle "Men's Pledge 4 Peace" Tee Specifications:

Our first men's signature shirt. This garment showcases our peace Logo. It heavily embodies unity & brotherhood. 

Featured Colors:
"Black With White Image"
"White With Black Image"                                             

100% preshrunk cotton
Fully double needle stitched
Seamless collar
Taped shoulder to shoulder

A large portion of the proceeds goes into giving back to the youth who live in the most poverty and senseless violence stricken areas of Philadelphia.

name: PEACEFUL CIRCLE "HISTORY" TEE (LIMITED EDITION)
description:
Peaceful Circle "History" Tee Specifications:

A very powerful message is being displayed with this tee. Which includes four phenomenal African American Men in history. Who individually stood for peace, positivity & productivity in the black community during their respective times. 

We feature... 

Malcolm X, an African American leader and prominent figure in the Nation of Islam, Malcolm X articulated concepts of race pride and black nationalism in the early 1960s.

Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. , a Baptist minister and social activist who led the civil rights movement in the United States from the mid-1950s until his death by assassination in 1968.

Muhammad Ali, a Boxer, philanthropist and social activist is considered one of the greatest athletes in boxing history, winning both the coveted Golden Gloves title and an Olympic gold medal, among several other honors.

And last but not at all least...

Our first ever African American President of The United States of America...

Barack H. Obama, In his second part of his term as a president, Obama has faced a number of obstacles and scored many victories as well. He signed his healthcare reform plan, known as the Affordable Care Act, into law in March 2010 known to most as "OBAMAcare"



Featured Colors:
"White With Black Image"
"Black With White Image"                                             

100% preshrunk cotton
Fully double needle stitched
Seamless collar
Taped shoulder to shoulder

A large portion of the proceeds goes into giving back to the youth who live in the most poverty and senseless violence stricken areas of Philadelphia.
